verses.roman:
svapne eka vipra kahe,--śunaha tapana
nimāñi-paṇḍita pāśe karaha gamana

synonyms: svapne—in a dream; eka—one; vipra—brāhmaṇa; kahe—says; śunaha—just hear; tapana—Tapana Miśra; nimāñi-paṇḍita—of the name Nimāi Paṇḍita; pāśe—unto Him; karaha gamana—go.
translation: Tapana Miśra, being thus bewildered, was directed by a brāhmaṇa in a dream to go to Nimāi Paṇḍita [Caitanya Mahāprabhu].
